questions.text: Where have you been this morning?
How was your relationship with your wife?

answers.text: Where the hell do you think I was? At my f*** house.
What are you saying, Mel?;You can't smoke in here!;FOCUS!!
Well, we were... things weren't going;well between us. Lately, she was spending;a lot of time in some pub.

questions.text: What is the name of the pub?
Do you think she was having an affair with someone?

answers.text: I think... it rhymed with something like... Malibu.
Yeah, his name is Alex. I hope he’s fine… I don’t want to talk about this now.
What?!? Well... maybe... I mean, I didn’t know where she has been most of the time so… why not... Maybe she met someone in the pub...
Don’t worry, we’ll do our best to find Alex
